name: Patient
description: Our patient information leaflets are designed for you and others involved in your care. All the information comes from up-to-date and carefully checked guidance for doctors but it has been written in a way that makes it clearer for non-medical people. Find out more about how we produce our patient information leaflets. You can browse all of our patient information leaflets below see all our guidelines on a particular topic (see ‘filter by subject’) or search for a specific word or phrase.Eye problems are some of the more noticeable health conditions - as soon as your vision goes blurry or your eyes become dry, you know something's up. At whatever age you pick up your condition, we've a wealth of information from clinical experts on how to look after your eyes.
